Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that a #fractured desert wall# hides #Man in Green's House#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Shadow Temple# hoards #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Ice Cavern# hoards #a Bottle#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: Dear @, please come to the castle. I've baked a cake for you.&Yours truly, princess Zelda.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Ice Cavern# hoards #the Serenade of Water#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #Spirit Temple# hoards #an Ice Trap#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that a school of #stingers swallowed by Jabu Jabu# guard #the Mirror Shield#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #a Small Key# can be found at #the Market#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #Death Mountain Trail# is on the way of the hero.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #a Hookshot# can be found at #Lake Hylia#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #fountain wall# hides the #Carpenters' tent#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Bottom of the Well# hoards #a Recovery Heart#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #Gerudo Training Grounds# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: You're playing a Randomizer. I'm randomized!^Here's a random number:  #4#.&Enjoy your Randomizer!

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that a #pool of lava# in Goron City blocks the way to #Wolfos# guarding a chest.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the way of the hero.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Mask of Truth# yields #Bombs (20 pieces)#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Saria's Song#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that a hero ventures #beyond the wasteland# to learn #the Minuet of Forest#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #a Small Key# can be found at #Goron City#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Strength Upgrade#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #a Small Key# can be found at #Desert Colossus#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that a #storm in the valley# reveals a pool guarded by a #Tektite#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that in #Goron City# the hammer unlocks #a Recovery Heart#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #the Hover Boots#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #Water Temple# hoards #Deku Nut Capacity#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #Zora's Domain# is on the way of the hero.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Slingshot#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Map#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that the #Water Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

ZR (Near Domain).text: 'Member when Ganon was a blue pig?^I 'member.
